Name: Defenders of Tetsoidea: Chrono Chonus
About the game: A contemporary active battle turn based RPG where it is your task to figure out why a demon invasion is suddenly happening, and battle against it. The game is about 4-7 hours long and is a 90s style RPG in a modern setting. There are over 90 maps to explore with lots of neat accessories to equip your party with. In combat, there is an active time meter to challenge your quick thinking skills! There are many bosses and they require a mix of strategies to defeat!
